body_html: @jg577 As mentioned in #12367, you can use SignatureDefs to get around the restriction. tf.estimator.export will loop you back to the restriction. Please refer to SignatureDefs in SaveModel for TensorFlow Serving for more details.
body_text: @jg577 As mentioned in #12367, you can use SignatureDefs to get around the restriction. tf.estimator.export will loop you back to the restriction.  Please refer to SignatureDefs in SaveModel for TensorFlow Serving for more details.
body: @jg577 As mentioned in [#12367](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/12367#issuecomment-335320352), you can use `SignatureDefs` to get around the restriction. `tf.estimator.export` will loop you back to the restriction.  Please refer to [SignatureDefs in SaveModel for TensorFlow Serving](https://github.com/tensorflow/serving/blob/master/tensorflow_serving/g3doc/signature_defs.md) for more details.
